resources.string: Press Start Button to Use and Control Your AirBiliNest

AirBiliNest by PT. Medika Karya Airlangga 


Vision: 

Becoming a company in the era of the fourth industrial revolution as a provider of healthcare equipment based on sustainable research and innovative research. 

Mision: 

Producing and providing high-quality products with international standards, PT Medika Karya Airlangga offers opportunities for competent human resources to create quality domestic works. We aim to dominate both national and international market

Smart Phototherapy System Airlangga Bilirubin Nesting or commonly known as AirBiliNest is a portable, adjusted dose phototherapy device that is intended to improve the quality of phototherapy services for hyperbilirubinemic babies that meet current community standards.

\nOn the first time you open the app, you will be facing the AirBiliNest Home Screen which has a button that will open the control page - to control your AirBiliNest. On the bottom of the app there are the navigation bar.

1. BiliNorm 
2. Platform 
3. AirBiliNest 
4. Patient Data Record 
5. About Us and Help 

1. BiliNorm

BiliNorm is a PWA based application integrated with Indonesian National Clinical Guideline of Neonatal Hyperbilirubinemia. This application aims to help health workers in neonatal hyperbilirubinemia management. 

2. AirBiliNest

On the home screen there is a start button to open the control page, Make sure that your phone is already connected to the AirBiliNest WiFi, 

SSID					: AirBiliNest 
Password	: 123456789 

Once your phone is connected you can access the control page by clicking the button. 

The control page have multiple icons like this,

1. Light intensity in Percentage 
2. Slider function to control the LED Intensity 
3. Temperature of the sensor on AirBiliNest 
4. Humidity of the sensor on AirBiliNest 
5. Heart Rate value from the sensor 
6. SpO2 value fromt he sensor 
7. Irradiance of the blue light in uW/cm^2/nm 
8. How long phototherapy has been running* 
9. Button to reset the time 
10. Button to turn on/off the alarm 

*The time start when the LEDs is being turn on, and paused when the LEDs is off 

Warning: 
When the temperature is higher than 36Â°C an alarm will turn on and the background screen will turn red, please immediately check for the AirBiliNest and the baby, and lower the intensity or turn off the light for a duratioin of time until the temperature is in desire condition. 

3. Patient Record
\nPatient Record page can be used to record the patient data, press the Add Patient button to add new patient. After clicking the button you can input the patient data including:

After completing the form, you can click the Save button, the data can be opened again on the main screen by clicking the patient name. Use the Export to Excel button to export all the saved patient data into your phone in excel (.xlsx) format, the file will be saved on your download folder under the name PatientData.xlsx, and Delete button to delete the patient data. 

4. About Us 
Contain the description of our company and product, manual on how to use AirBiliNest and this app.

1. Why I can't open/connected to the control page? 

Check if your phone already connected to AirBiliNest wifi 
SSID					: AirBiliNest 
Password	: 12345678 
and turn off your mobile internet data.

2. Where is the exported excel file located? 

The exported excel of patient data is saved on the download folder of your phone by the name 'PatientData.xlsx'.

3. Why is the exported excel not saved on my phone? 

Please allow the app permission to save and read files on the phone.

4. The BiliNorm page cannot be opened 

When opening the BiliNorm page for the first time, please turn on your mobile data connection or connect to wifi with internet connection.

5. Do my phone need to be connected to the AirBiliNest WiFi all the time? 

When the phototherapy is in process it is recommended that your phone is always connected to the AirBiliNest Wifi. Recommended to use dedicated mobile phone to control the AirBiliNest.

6. Can I transfer the patient data from one phone to other phone? 

The extracted file can be shared to other devices, but to transfer the data from one AirBiliNest app to other AirBiliNest app on other phone is not yet supported.
